bibl.title: "Oversexed, Overpaid and over here": A Response to Angelos Chaniotis.

series.title: Heidelberger althistorische Beiträge und epigraphische Studien.

bibl.note: A response to: Angelos CHANIOTIS, Foreign Soldiers - Native Girls? Constructing and Crossing Boundaries in Hellenistic Cities with Foreign Garrisons, ibidem, pp. 99-113.

bibl.title: Army and Power in the Ancient World

bibl.seg: MA John, "Oversexed, Overpaid and over here": A Response to Angelos Chaniotis.
Angelos CHANIOTIS and Pierre DUCREY (Edd.), Army and Power in the Ancient World = Heidelberger althistorische Beiträge und epigraphische Studien. 37 (Stuttgart, 2002) pp. 115-122.
A response to: Angelos CHANIOTIS, Foreign Soldiers - Native Girls? Constructing and Crossing Boundaries in Hellenistic Cities with Foreign Garrisons, ibidem, pp. 99-113.
